# VirtualScroller.getOffset() method

Get pixel offset by item index;

**Signature:**

```typescript
getOffset(index: number): number;
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

Parameter


</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

index


</td><td>

number


</td><td>

Item index. Must be &lt;<!-- -->= [itemCount](/virtual/reference/virtual-core.virtualscrollerruntimeparams.itemcount)


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns**

number

Pixel offset

## Remarks

Possible offset range: 0 &lt;<!-- -->= N &lt;<!-- -->= [scrollSize](/virtual/reference/virtual-core.virtualscroller.scrollsize)<!-- -->. Time complexity: `O(log2(itemCount))`
